settings.text:
Marensius is an emerging progressive house artist from Oslo, Norway, making his debut with the "Iris EP”, a collaboration with his label mate Hovland. While new to the progressive scene under this alias, Marensius is no stranger to electronic music—he is better known as DECO 5000, a project that has amassed hundreds of thousands of streams across platforms.

With a deep appreciation for melody and groove, Marensius brings a refined yet dynamic approach to progressive house, implementing elements of vibrant 5k in his compositions. Over the past year, he has made a name for himself in Oslo’s electronic music scene, performing at clubs and events with his producer collective “Skammekroquen” and “OC/DC”, while also supporting industry heavyweights Jeremy Olander, KREAM and Sébastien Léger.
